name: RX-78-2 Gundam
text: Haste. When this enters, draw 1 card. While you control a Pilot, this gains +1 power.

name: MS-06S Zaku II
text: Haste. When this attacks, destroy target Unit with power 3 or less.

name: Amuro Ray
text: Attach to a Unit. That Unit gains +2 power and First Strike.

name: Beam Shield
text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target Unit or player this turn. Draw 1 card.

name: Side 7 Colony
text: Generate 2 Blue resources at start of your turn. Your Units cost 1 less to play.

name: RGM-79 GM
text: When you play another Unit, this gains +1 power until end of turn.

name: PMX-003 The-O
text: Unblockable. Costs 1 less for each Pilot you control.

name: Char Aznable
text: Attach to a Unit. That Unit gains Haste and +2 power. When attached Unit attacks, draw 1 card.

name: Beam Rifle
text: Deal 3 damage to target Unit. If that Unit has Flying, deal 5 damage instead.

name: Zeon Mobile Armor
text: Flying. When this attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemy Units without Flying.

name: GAT-X105 Strike
text: When this enters, search your deck for a Pilot card and add it to your hand.

name: Kira Yamato
text: Attach to a Unit. Generate 1 additional resource each turn. Attached Unit gains +2 power.

name: ZGMF-1017 GINN
text: This costs 1 less for each other GINN you control.

name: Lacus Clyne
text: When this enters, draw 2 cards. Attached Unit has protection from Commands.

name: Phase Shift Armor
text: Target Unit gains Armor 5 until end of turn. (Prevent the first 5 damage dealt to it this turn.)

name: Archangel
text: Generate 2 resources of any color at start of your turn. You may draw an extra card each turn.

name: GN-001 Exia
text: Whenever you play a Command, this gains +1 power until end of turn. Can attack twice per turn.

name: Setsuna F. Seiei
text: Attach to a Unit. Attached Unit gains +3 power and 'When this attacks, untap it.'

name: Haro
text: Attach to a Unit. When attached Unit attacks, you may pay 1: Draw a card.

name: GN Drive
text: Search your deck for up to 2 Blue cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: ASW-G-08 Barbatos
text: Armor 2. This gains +1 power for each other Mobile Suit you control.

name: Mikazuki Augus
text: Attach to a Unit. Attached Unit has 'When this attacks, destroy target Unit with power 3 or less.'

name: Orga Itsuka
text: Attach to a Unit. Your other Units cost 1 less to play. Draw 1 card when this enters.

name: RX-0 Unicorn
text: When this enters, destroy all enemy Units with cost 4 or less. Pay 3: Transform to Destroy Mode (gains +2 power and Beam).

name: Banagher Links
text: Attach to a Unit. Pay 3: All your Units gain +4 power until end of turn. Attached Unit has protection from Black.

name: Full Armor System
text: Target Unit gains +3 power and Beam until end of turn. Draw 1 card.

name: XXXG-01W Wing
text: Flying. Transform: Pay 2 to become Wing Zero (gains +2 power and First Strike).

name: Heero Yuy
text: Attach to a Unit. Attached Unit gains +2 power, Flying, and 'Cannot be destroyed by Commands.'

name: Buster Rifle
text: Destroy target Unit with power 6 or less. Deal 3 damage to opponent.

name: MSZ-006 Zeta
text: Flying. Transform: Pay 2 to become Wave Rider mode (gains +1 power and cannot be blocked).

name: Generic Resource
text: Add 2 colorless resources to your resource pool. Draw 1 card.

name: Mobile Suit Hangar
text: Generate 1 resource of any color at start of your turn. Your Units gain +1 power.
